term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - j-value in atmospheric chemistry
term.title: j-value

item.text: An effective first order rate constant for a photochemical reaction (photodecomposition, etc.) of light-absorbing impurities in the atmosphere.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2198 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
